name: SocialRolesSatisfaction
title: Social Roles Satisfaction
description: Person's satisfaction with their social role (Business ID: Entry 115499)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing Social Roles Satisfaction.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an person's satisfaction with their social role.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes LOINC codes for Social Roles Satisfaction.),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Social Roles Satisfaction.)
